articles.author: The editorial board
articles.title: Three inconvenient truths about the critical minerals race - Financial Times
articles.description: China is so far winning the global scramble for metals needed in the green transition
articles.content: Few consumers are likely to be familiar with the uses of gallium or germanium. But the chemicals which are used in solar panels, as well as optical fibres have acquired newfound fame this month after… [+3678 chars]
